# Vapor-text

A node module and CLI for vaporising your text

## Install

```
npm install -g vapor-text
```


## Run

In JS:
```js
var vapor = require('vapor-text')

vapor('Hello, World!')
//Ｈｅｌｌｏ， Ｗｏｒｌｄ！
```

Or CLI:
```
flip "Ｈｅｌｌｏ， Ｗｏｒｌｄ！"
```
